article.name: mkv25 blue
article.description:
This render, possibly, led me to create the name, of the website, mkv25.net. mkv25 blue. produced after mkv16 (orange).
Looks like a virus to me. Its probably not that harmful, considering I rendered it using Lightwave 7. I found a good tutorial that showed me how to create a simple 3D model, then using noisy textures produce a electron microscope style image.
The effect works very well.
article.keywords: mkv25, mkv, virus, noisy, texture, electron, microscope, vision, lightwave, 3d, model, modelling, colours, design, artwork, infection, 28 days, later, blue, naming, website.
